Pre-Game Insights: Belarus will be looking to kick off their Nations League campaign on a high, but they face the stern challenge of taking on a Bulgaria side who are unbeaten in six consecutive matches.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Belarus are currently 99th in the latest FIFA World Rankings
Bulgaria have won just one of their last 15 matches across all competitions
Belarus are unbeaten in their last four competitive matches
Bulgaria have failed to win their last eight competitive matches
